title: Lime Playground Sandbox
description: Lime Playground Sandbox is an action game where you must kill all the zombies. This game offers a unique combination of machine gun shooting, car driving, and destruction. There are three game modes you can play: Sandbox Mode, where you can place any objects you want and play with your imagination. Campaign Mode, where you must complete all the levels and collect 3 lemons at each level. Survival Mode, where you must survive as long as possible from the hordes of zombies. Have fun as you like!
